title: An LLL algorithm with symmetries
authors: Beth Romano and Jack A. Thorne
abstract:
We give a generalisation of the Lenstra-Lenstra-Lov\'asz (LLL)
lattice-reduction algorithm that is valid for an arbitrary (split, semisimple)
reductive group $G$. This can be regarded as `lattice reduction with
symmetries'. We make this algorithm explicit for the classical groups $G =
\mathrm{Sp}_{2g}$, $\mathrm{SO}_{2g}$, and for the exceptional group $G = G_2$.
